channel.title: BUbreakingHeadlines
channel.description: This is an interleaved feed of the most recent entries from BUbreakingHeadlines, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Ticketmaster's pricing for Oasis tickets is under investigation in the UK

item.title: Smoked in: Air quality in entire Boise area is unhealthy. Here’s what’s causing it
Trump says he'd put Elon Musk at helm of proposed agency "if he has the time"
item.description: Former President Trump threw his support behind a government efficiency commission backed by tech giant Elon Musk.

item.title: Pope Francis promotes religious harmony in Indonesia, condemns violent extremism
item.description: As he continues to promote religious harmony, Pope Francis visited Jakarta's Istiqlal Mosque, the largest mosque in Southeast Asia, on Thursday.

item.title: Putin says 'main' goal is to capture Ukraine's Donbas

item.title: Jan. 6 hearing: Judge says immunity is 'linchpin,' prosecutors seek to move 'quickly'
item.description: As former President Trump's election interference case resumes, get updates on today's hearing in front of the federal judge overseeing the case.

item.title: Hunter Biden looks to enter 'Alford plea' as tax trial set to begin
item.description: Prosecutors accused Hunter Biden of failing to pay $1.4 million in taxes.

item.title: A 13-foot (and growing) python was seized from a New York home and sent to a zoo
Should you wait for the September Fed meeting to buy a home?
item.description: With rate cuts looming, buyers may be wondering if they should wait to buy a home. Here's what to consider now.
